meanings.definition: The quality or state of being garish or excessively bright or showy.
meanings.sent1: The garishnesses of the decorations hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent2: Her outfit was a perfect example of garishnesses.
meanings.sent3: The garishnesses of the clown's costume made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The garishnesses of the neon lights turned the street into a carnival.
meanings.sent5: The garishnesses of the painting made it impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Instances of being garish or excessively bright or showy.
meanings.sent1: The room was filled with garishnesses colors that clashed horribly.
meanings.sent2: The garishnesses decorations at the party were overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: She tried to tone down the garishnesses look with a simple scarf.
meanings.sent4: The garishnesses design of the building stood out among the rest.
meanings.sent5: The garishnesses patterns on the fabric were hard to miss.
